mdp_court_erreur: ⛔ The password must contain 8 characters minimum
mdp_min_erreur: ⛔ The password must contain at least 1 tiny
mdp_maj_erreur: ⛔ The password must contain at least 1 capital
mdp_int_erreur: ⛔ The password must contain at least 1 figure
mdp_char_erreur: ⛔ The password must contain at least 1 special character
